Hellooowoh,.. it's ME.

I was wondering if after all these years you like to meet.

Ok so instead of working, I started this blog. I was inspired by Colah’s blog, but then thought I’d better start with something a little more simple. So I found Jekyll Now and elected to give it a go. Barry’s article in smashing magazine is helpful.

I’ve attempted a few blogs before now, including a wordpress site. Using static pages with jekyll and markdown. This is the easiest by far!

Cool. Now for some content…
